languages.text: "Бандиты... смешное слово в Комморре. Ревущие — это банда смертников, что живет в ожидании неизбежной гибели на арене. А в ней куда больше смысла, чем во всех других смертях, что поджидают тебя в Темном городе".

"Criminal... In Commorragh, the word sounds like a joke. The Shriekers are a gang of the doomed. They live in expectation of their inevitable death in the arena. And that death makes a lot more sense than all the other deaths on offer in the Dark City."
languages.original_text: "Бандиты... смешное слово в Комморре. Ревущие — это банда смертников, что живет в ожидании неизбежной гибели на арене. А в ней куда больше смысла, чем во всех других смертях, что поджидают тебя в Темном городе".

traits.locale_text: "Criminal... In Commorragh, the word sounds like a joke. The Shriekers are a gang of the doomed. They live in expectation of their inevitable death in the arena. And that death makes a lot more sense than all the other deaths on offer in the Dark City."
traits.speaker: DrukhariSslyth_MeleeRanged_Anger

languages.text: “罪犯……在科摩罗，这个词听起来就像是个笑话一样。尖啸者是一群注定要死的人。他们活着就是为了在竞技场上战斗，期望有朝一日能死在竞技场上。在黑暗之城里，在竞技场上战死比别的死法都更有意义。”
languages.original_text: "Criminal... In Commorragh, the word sounds like a joke. The Shriekers are a gang of the doomed. They live in expectation of their inevitable death in the arena. And that death makes a lot more sense than all the other deaths on offer in the Dark City."

traits.locale_text: “罪犯……在科摩罗，这个词听起来就像是个笑话一样。尖啸者是一群注定要死的人。他们活着就是为了在竞技场上战斗，期望有朝一日能死在竞技场上。在黑暗之城里，在竞技场上战死比别的死法都更有意义。”
traits.speaker: DrukhariSslyth_MeleeRanged_Anger

languages.text: «Criminales... En Commorragh, esa palabra es un chiste. Los Aulladores son una banda de condenados. Viven esperando su inevitable muerte en la arena. Una muerte con mucho más sentido que las otras que ofrece la Ciudad Siniestra».
languages.original_text: "Criminal... In Commorragh, the word sounds like a joke. The Shriekers are a gang of the doomed. They live in expectation of their inevitable death in the arena. And that death makes a lot more sense than all the other deaths on offer in the Dark City."

traits.locale_text: «Criminales... En Commorragh, esa palabra es un chiste. Los Aulladores son una banda de condenados. Viven esperando su inevitable muerte en la arena. Una muerte con mucho más sentido que las otras que ofrece la Ciudad Siniestra».
traits.speaker: DrukhariSslyth_MeleeRanged_Anger

languages.text: 「犯罪者か…コモラフではそんな言葉も可愛らしく聞こえる。シュリーカーとは先の未来に絶望しかないならず者の集まりだ。彼らは闘技場でやがて訪れる死を予期しながら生きている。仄暗き都では他の死に方より、そのほうがよほど理にかなっている」
languages.original_text: "Criminal... In Commorragh, the word sounds like a joke. The Shriekers are a gang of the doomed. They live in expectation of their inevitable death in the arena. And that death makes a lot more sense than all the other deaths on offer in the Dark City."

traits.locale_text: 「犯罪者か…コモラフではそんな言葉も可愛らしく聞こえる。シュリーカーとは先の未来に絶望しかないならず者の集まりだ。彼らは闘技場でやがて訪れる死を予期しながら生きている。仄暗き都では他の死に方より、そのほうがよほど理にかなっている」
traits.speaker: DrukhariSslyth_MeleeRanged_Anger

languages.text: "Verbrecher ... In Commorragh klingt das Wort wie ein Witz. Die Kreischer sind eine Band der Verdammten. Sie leben in Erwartung ihres unvermeidlichen Tods in der Arena. Und dieser Tod ist deutlich sinnvoller als die anderen Tode, welche die Dunkle Stadt zu bieten hat."
languages.original_text: "Criminal... In Commorragh, the word sounds like a joke. The Shriekers are a gang of the doomed. They live in expectation of their inevitable death in the arena. And that death makes a lot more sense than all the other deaths on offer in the Dark City."

traits.locale_text: "Verbrecher ... In Commorragh klingt das Wort wie ein Witz. Die Kreischer sind eine Band der Verdammten. Sie leben in Erwartung ihres unvermeidlichen Tods in der Arena. Und dieser Tod ist deutlich sinnvoller als die anderen Tode, welche die Dunkle Stadt zu bieten hat."
traits.speaker: DrukhariSslyth_MeleeRanged_Anger

languages.text: « Des criminels... À Commorragh, ce mot fait l'effet d'une plaisanterie. Les Hurleurs sont une bande d'êtres condamnés. Ils vivent dans l'attente de leur mort inévitable dans l'arène, et cette mort a bien plus de sens que toutes les autres proposées dans la Cité Crépusculaire. »
languages.original_text: "Criminal... In Commorragh, the word sounds like a joke. The Shriekers are a gang of the doomed. They live in expectation of their inevitable death in the arena. And that death makes a lot more sense than all the other deaths on offer in the Dark City."

traits.locale_text: « Des criminels... À Commorragh, ce mot fait l'effet d'une plaisanterie. Les Hurleurs sont une bande d'êtres condamnés. Ils vivent dans l'attente de leur mort inévitable dans l'arène, et cette mort a bien plus de sens que toutes les autres proposées dans la Cité Crépusculaire. »
traits.speaker: DrukhariSslyth_MeleeRanged_Anger

languages.text: "Suçluymuş... Bu söz, Commorragh'ta bu dediğini gülünç buluruz. Çığırtkanlar, ölümünü bekleyenlerin çetesidir. Arenadaki kaçınılmaz ölümlerine kadar gün sayarlar. Kara Şehir'de tercihimize sunulan diğer ölümlere bakınca böyle ölmek çok daha mantıklıdır."
languages.original_text: "Criminal... In Commorragh, the word sounds like a joke. The Shriekers are a gang of the doomed. They live in expectation of their inevitable death in the arena. And that death makes a lot more sense than all the other deaths on offer in the Dark City."

traits.locale_text: "Suçluymuş... Commorragh'ta kulağa şaka gibi geliyor bu söz. Çığırtkanlar, ölümünü bekleyenlerin çetesidir. Arenadaki kaçınılmaz ölümlerine kadar gün sayarlar. Kara Şehir'de tercihimize sunulan diğer ölümlere bakınca böyle ölmek çok daha mantıklı geiyor."
traits.speaker: DrukhariSslyth_MeleeRanged_Anger
